nodes.text: The Heart was a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It was the first adventure in the EndTimes trilogy and was written by Morrie Mullins and Jae Walker.

An important conference is planned in the Cularin system, but it is believed that the Believers have a mole, who will give them details of its location and allow them to attack it. The heroes are sent to attend a decoy conference and later track down and destroy a Believers cell in Tolea Biqua.
